name: Please, Turn It Off
description:
Paris, 2020.
The Sharonavirus made it's way to France and the country has gone into a full Lockdown. All citizens are forced to stay at home, and will experience a different way of life.

The main character is a young woman, confined at home. Her flat is quite nice, spacious and functional.

One full run of the game is expected to take ~30 minutes.

Did you play the game?
Please, take a look at our form: https://forms.gle/xxccsheYa9JKBEcU6
Your answers would help us greatly when working on the second iteration.

PLEASE, TURN IT OFF is a game made during the Lockdown by Kas BRANDSMA & Arthur COUSSEAU (Programming), Bernard POULET (Art Direction), FUBAR (Music), Pierre BOUVY (Game & Narrative Design).
